评论详情: I was expecting a lot more from this top. When I think baby tee I think fitted, however it is pretty loose and not flattering. The print on it looks cheap and feels cheap. Only use it to wear underneath shirts now because I don’t like the way it looks.

i got the white olive shirt and the red cat shirt olives- quality relates to the price. i will be hand washing considering that it is just screened on, but that's fine it was a cheap trendy shirt off amazon. I would recommend it. boxy fit not tight red cat- I originally thought the olive shirt was going to be the better quality shirt but it was actually this one. its a thicker material and is super soft. i will probably hand wash this one as well, just to increase the longevity of these shirts. definitely recommend.

评论概述: Super cute and fun for summer

90s fit, I got a X-large, I’m 5’8” 130 lbs.
Fits exactly as described

The art is like a shiny plastic sticker slapped on the shirt with poor quality pictures that is over pixilated. I had higher hopes :/. The quality of the shirt without the sticker is not very soft but ok.
So cute! Wore them with my red boxers from Amazon!  I sized one size up! The fit is perfect

Cute but cheap. Design and fit just like the stock photo. The tshirt itself is nice but the screen printing is extremely cheap. I’m going to keep it bc it’s cute but I hope it lasts at least a few wears without peeling off.
I was skeptical at first of the quality of this little tee but it's so good! It's 100% cotton and feels stretchy, soft and super comfy, I'm obsessed. Totally a vibe for summer!! GET IT :)
It's a baby tee for sure. I'm a true medium and this fits like a XS. Just know that it's small and the text/graphic is screen printed.
Soft , fits good , good quality,  my kid loves it . Great gift . Affordable.

Decent quality for price! Fits great. So cute. Hoping they wash well and the images done end up peeling. But all in all so cute!!

评论概述: Small side and decal is cheap
评论详情: Definitely a baby doll size so size up if you’ve hit puberty and that’s saying something from someone with a small chest. Decal is cute but of a cheap quality that looks like it’ll peel off easily, so set that expectation low.

I used this product for an outfit for a photo and it looks good in pictures but looks poorly made in person. The image on the baby tee is similar to what you see advertised but it's not as good looking or well placed on the shirt. It's an ok top but not what I expected, the fit and length are ok as well.

The image quality is exactly as pictured, and remains in good shape even after multiple washes. The fabric stretches comfortably, and I do think this is true to size. I especially like that the fabric is thin enough to be breathable,  yet not see-through.
just a heads up in case you didn’t zoom in on the picture…. this olive shirt says “eager to please”. hello? wanted to wear this to work and now it’s weird

评论概述: Soft material, but poor design quality
评论详情: I was initially very excited about this top! For $14, you do get what you pay for but at the same time I feel like it could've been better. The design lays nicely, but looks very different from the photo. The promo photo shows a vintage look to the tomatoes and the vine that you do not get with the actual shirt. I will be returning this asap, but do want to note that it turned out much better than I expected. The material is soft, it looks like a good crop and does not seem to be see-through.
Buy the shirt. They're sooo good 😩 I want every single one. The quality is great!

The shirt is definitely cute. The fit and quality of the T itself is awesome! And as someone who loves a gin martini, it definitely hits the mark. But the olive image is a transfer image so I'm worried that over time it wll not hold up.  I'm not upset with my purchase at all, but it wasn't what I really expected.

I got the one with the flower pot, runs small, order a size or two up, especially if you are big busted! I am usually a large, ordered a large and an XL would have been better and still would have given me the cropped tight fit.
Shirt is cute but this product is so small! I even returned to get a large and it still felt so tight. Would not recommend unless you size way up.

Sooooo cute baby tee indeed! Larger chested girlies I wear a 36DD god a medium it’s deffo a little tight in the chestical region but that’s what I wanted! So friggen cute I love

So my olive shirt came with the words "Eager to tease" written under the bowl, which was clearly not pictured. The quality of the shirt is fine, and the print is still somewhat cute... but I was not expecting it to say that?
This baby tee is so cute and trendy. I got so many compliments. However, I will say that the graphic on shirt feels a little weird, but its not so much of an issue.

The shirt itself is very cute and not see-through, but the print seems like it could very easily come off in the dryer. I washed it on cold and dried it with cold air, not heat and the design stayed on.
This is definitely a BABY tee lol I’m usually a medium/large glad I got the large it fit perfectly. Print didn’t look weird or cheap, perfect dupe of the Lisa says gah tees.
Loved the design, but the top is so incredibly small! Also, I ordered the pomegranate top and it never arrived… bummer!

I absolutely love this baby tee. The vibrant colors for this graphic design are so fun and give off summer vibes. Unique yet cute graphic print. The material seems to be great quality. The fabric itself looks different than the pictures but I actually like it better. It's stretchy, and overall super comfortable. I've already wore this once and absolutely loved it. It crops around after/on my belly button so I appreciate how it's not super cropped. 10/10, no complaints.

类型: Size: MediumColor: Short Tail Red Cat
评论详情: The fabric is stretchier/slinkier than I expected (the photo made it look like a stiff/starchy cotton). It honestly feels better quality, although because of the stretch it’s a bit more form fitted. Wasn’t an issue for me though. The white fabric is a tad see through but nothing crazy. I can wear by itself with just the girlies, but around guys will prob need a bra. I got the red cat with cowboy boots print - so cute!

I absolutely love this baby tee! The graphic design is so fun and stylish & the colors add such a fun pop to the white base. The material is nice and stretchy which I personally love & overall just very comfortable. I also love that you can dress up or dress down this top with different bottoms and accessories. I cannot wait to style this tee this summer!

I've been on the hunt for some fun graphic tees/baby tees for the summer, and I stumbled upon this adorable piece! It's absolutely cute and versatile – I can easily pair it with a skirt or pants for various looks. The material feels nice and stretchy, albeit on the thinner side. Opted for a size small for a more slim fit, and it hits just at my belly button. While the print has a glossy/plastic-y finish, it still looks exactly like the photo! Overall, I'm loving it!
Love the fit and the quality of this shirt. Such a cute top and for the price point I think it's a great steal!!
